objects.text: Pretty in Pink Luxury Makeup Set

• Premium blush compact with mirror for perfect application on-the-go
• Silky-smooth powder formula for natural, buildable coverage
• Luxurious silver packaging with elegant aesthetics
• Matching pink lipstick with professional finish
• Long-lasting, pigment-rich color for all skin tones

product_details.name: Pretty in Pink Luxury Makeup Set - Timeless Beauty Essentials
product_details.description:
• Premium pink blush compact with built-in mirror for perfect application on-the-go
• Silky-smooth powder formula for natural, buildable coverage
• Luxurious silver and black packaging for elegant aesthetics
• Matching pink lipstick in sleek silver tube with professional finish
• Long-lasting, pigment-rich color coordination
• Professional-grade makeup essentials perfect for daily wear
• Classic black compact design with protective closure
• Travel-friendly size for your purse or makeup bag
• Perfect pink shades suitable for all skin tones
• High-quality mirror for precise application anywhere

banner_details:
This banner features a glamorous design for a makeup product promotion, centered around a luxurious, feminine aesthetic. The backdrop consists of a soft radial gradient blending from blush pink to rose, enhanced by delicate abstract curves and subtle graphic elements for visual texture. The product image, showcasing a matching lipstick and blush compact, is placed prominently at the center. Three text layers—`heading`, `subheading`, and `description`—communicate the premium nature of the offer, with stylish fonts and high readability. The `price` layer stands out in bold, deep magenta, and a vibrant purple rectangular button (`cta_background`) with white `cta` text invites action.

**Color Palette:**
- Blush Pink: #FFD6E0
- Rose Pink: #F8B7CD
- Deep Magenta: #831843
- Plum: #9D174D
- Violet: #A21CAF
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern cosmetic set, featuring a lipstick and compact blush in complementary shades of pink. The color palette is built around a vibrant candy pink (#EC6AA7), used prominently in both the lipstick and blush, conveying femininity and freshness. Accents of silver (#D7D7D7) on the lipstick tube add a touch of sophistication and contrast, while the black casing (#1A1A1A) provides a bold, structured frame that grounds and emphasizes the pink tones. The colors are well-blended yet distinctly highlighted, making each component stand out while maintaining a cohesive aesthetic suitable for beauty advertisement banners.
